title: My pixel 4 needs to be fixed, google does not support my country. Can I get any help?!
content: My pixel 4 is not playing sounds nor the microphone is working. It's because of the AC. It's faulty. But I'm not able to fix it as google does not support my country. Can I get some help dear google?! I will be happy to own the pixel 5 please. Please Please Please I've been contacting you in Twitter but unfortunately I didn't get any response.
